name: Ruven Themes: Social Widget
author: Ruven

sections.description:
This plugin registers a widget to display links to your social networks.
It uses font icons to display the links.

The following networks are supported:

  • Dribbble
  • Facebook
  • Flickr
  • GitHub
  • Google+
  • Instagram
  • LinkedIn
  • Pinterest
  • RSS
  • StumbleUpon
  • Tumblr
  • Twitter
  • Vimeo
  • YouTube
sections.installation:
This plugin can be installed directly from your site:

  1. Log in and navigate to Plugins → Add New.
  2. Type “Ruven Themes: Social Widget” into the Search input and click the “Search Plugins” button.
  3. Locate the “Ruven Themes: Social Widget” in the list of search results and click “Install Now”.
  4. Click the “Activate Plugin” link at the bottom of the install screen.

It can also be installed manually:

  1. Download the “Ruven Themes: Social Widget” plugin from WordPress.org.
  2. Unzip the package and move it into your plugins directory.
  3. Log into WordPress and navigate to the “Plugins” screen.
  4. Locate “Ruven Themes: Social Widget” in the list and click the “Activate” link.

short_description: RT Social Widget adds a widget to display links to your social networks.
